subject: Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race (Alaska)
Dog Sledding
lead_paragraph: The Iditarod Trail Sled Dog Race has begun, with 67 teams entered in this year’s 1,100-mile race from Anchorage to Nome. The restart, where the real racing begins, was held Sunday in Willow, about 50 miles from Anchorage, where the ceremonial start was held a day earlier. The two-time defending champion, Lance Mackey, is looking for his third consecutive win.
